reviewText: Here is an easy and inexpensive way to build your collection of classic TV. Three classic series, The Lucy Show, Susie (Private Secretary), and I Married Joan. While The Lucy Show is widely available, the other two are a little more obscure and with all three on one set, you are in for some fun viewing. Pop the discs in and have yourself a marathon of classic comedy. You'll find it much better than some of the new shows.
